title: The Fine Print
author: Lauren Asher
summary: A charming, emotional story about ambition, dreams, and falling for someone who challenges everything you thought you wanted.

title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
summary: An insightful exploration of how human behavior influences financial decisions, and why managing money is more about mindset than math.

title: Company of One
author: Paul Jarvis
summary: A revolutionary look at how staying small and independent can bring more freedom, creativity, and success in modern entrepreneurship.
